participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Emily loves exploring nature and is very social.
participant_1.background: I am going to start school at the university of Kentucky. I have 2 brothers. I have been in band all four years of high school. I am a senior in high school.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and family-oriented, Michael enjoys spending time outdoors and values peace and quiet.
participant_2.background: I have an internship at a computer company. My mom is a lawyer. I have 5 children. I am a student.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking and camping.
I love hiking! I've been in band all four years of high school, so I'm not very athletic, but I still love to get out there and enjoy nature.
That's awesome! I'm not very athletic either, but I love the outdoors.
So, what's your favorite thing about hiking?
I love being able to get away from everything and just enjoy the peace and quiet.
That's so true. I love being able to clear my head and just relax.
And I love seeing all the beautiful scenery.
Me too! I love getting up to the top of a mountain and looking out over the view.
I love that too! It's so amazing to see how vast the world is.
So, where's your favorite place to hike?
I really love hiking in the mountains. I live in California, so I'm lucky to have so many beautiful mountains to choose from.
That's awesome! I'm from Kentucky, so I'm not too far from the mountains either.
I'm sure Kentucky has some beautiful mountains as well.
It does! I love hiking in the Appalachian Mountains.
I've heard good things about the Appalachian Mountains. I've always wanted to go hiking there.
I will! I'm definitely going to put it on my bucket list.
